name: Sapphics, Slimes, and the Adventures of Kingdomville
name_original: Sapphics, Slimes, and the Adventures of Kingdomville
description:
Welcome to Kingdomville! Kingdomville is a happy little kingdom ran by Princess Blueberry, until they are kidnapped under mysterious circumstances. You play as the brave knight Alexander The Greater, and do battle against the villainous slimes standing in your path!

This game was created by a small team of first-time game developers for their university course, we all hope your enjoy our silly little game for what it is <<3

Love from team Banana Beans!

Credits:

  • Starlight: Enemy AI, Character Movement, Animation
  • Eira: Artist, Lead Level Designer, Maintenance
  • Freddy: Tilemap Creator, Secondary Level Designer
  • Lewis:  Play-Tester, Bug-Tester
